channel.title: Al-Kharid smelter by Sumilion
channel.description: Hola, This was my very first script. I never tested it very long because i never had the iron :rolleyes:, but i heard some peeps managed to run it for 3 hours :eek:. Well, have a look and see if it can be of value to you... By the way, it says Sumilion cause i want my name changed... so now you know ;)

item.title: Al-Kharid smelter by Sumilion
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Holy shit if this works!

I’m gonna start mining and smithing soon with my new account and I’m gonna definatly try this out. Tough it will take some time to get enough ores to run this script for long, for good progress report

Nice job man

Read full topic
